Package com.example.myurbanflix

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateAccountActivity
    This defines the Account Creation page, which takes input from text fields and compares to database to ensure no duplicate usernames/emails are being used.
    CreateReviewActivity
    This class manages the Create Review Activity using Firestore, in which users can create reviews if they are logged in, and push those reviews to the firestore.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FirestoreAdapter<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    Class is used as a firebase adapter which wraps around recyclerview.adapter and optimizes recycler for user with google firebase
    FirestoreHelper
    Used to access the firestore database from one central location.
    LoginActivity
    This defines the Login Activity page, which allows the user to input their credentials, and if they match, logs the user in and returns them home.
    MainActivity
    This opens the home page and makes a connection to the firebase db in order to populate a local recycler view which the user can interact with.
    MovieReview
    Defines a Movie Review for the purpose of pushing a review remotely to the database.
    MovieReviewAdapter
    This adapter is used for all recycler views in order to inflate movie_review_views and populate them with data from our firestore query.
    MovieSearchActivity
    This is the activity that is opened when a user searches for a particular movie.
    User
    This class is used to define a User as the database will understand it.
    ViewAccountActivity
    This activity allows the user to view their post history and log out if they so decide.
